name: roxabi-marketplace
description: Open-source Claude Code plugins by Roxabi — context engineering tools for teams.

plugins.name: memory-audit
plugins.description: Drain auto-memory to zero — every entry gets resolved (fix/promote/relocate/delete) with audit logging and recurrence detection.

plugins.name: compress
plugins.description: Rewrite agent and skill definitions using compact math/logic notation to reduce token usage while preserving semantics.

plugins.name: 1b1
plugins.description: Walk through a list of items one by one — brief, decide, execute, repeat.

plugins.name: web-intel
plugins.description: Multi-platform URL scraper (Twitter/X, GitHub, YouTube, Reddit, webpages) with 6 analysis skills: scrape, summarize, analyze, roast, benchmark, adapt.

plugins.name: dev-core
plugins.description: Full development workflow — frame, shape, plan, implement, review, ship. Opinionated Roxabi process with 18 skills, 9 agents, and safety hooks.

plugins.name: voice-cli
plugins.description: VoiceCLI assistant — author TTS scripts, generate speech, clone voices, transcribe audio. Knows engine capabilities, markdown format, and all CLI commands.

plugins.name: linkedin-post-generator
plugins.description: Generate engaging LinkedIn posts with best practices and visual identity.

plugins.name: image-prompt-generator
plugins.description: Generate AI image prompts with visual identity and style consistency.

plugins.name: vault
plugins.description: Unified local data vault — SQLite+FTS5 index, CRUD, full-text search across all Roxabi plugins.

plugins.name: cv
plugins.description: Generate and adapt CVs from structured JSON data, with tailoring for specific job postings.

plugins.name: get-invoice-details
plugins.description: Extract structured data from invoice documents (text or PDF) and store as JSON.
